description:
When sections are empty, show expandable help cards that reveal tips on click: keyboard shortcuts, drag-and-drop tips, or integration possibilities. Dismissible but easily recalled via help icon.

**Rationale:** Users need different levels of guidance. Progressive disclosure respects power users who want minimal UI while helping newcomers discover advanced features at their own pace.
